name: El Farolito
summary: Come spend a pleasant evening with us. Check out our restaurant, El Farolito. In addition to being very welcoming, it will surprise you with delicious tapas, pizzas, grilled meat, rice dishes, and paella. Our outdoor area is especially beautiful. And when night falls and it gets cooler, you can move to the terrace with heaters. No matter what the weather is like outside, our air-conditioned rooms always maintain the perfect temperature.
address: Pla√ßa de Milagros Consarnau i Sabat√©, 26, 08902 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Barcelona, Spain
day_hint: This restaurant specializes in hearty dishes like paella and pizzas, served in a casual atmosphere with outdoor seating. Its family-friendly vibe makes it a great choice for your first evening.
